attributes.action: Make exam boards transparent and retake them under government control.
attributes.additional_details:
2018: Edexcel; C4 Maths
2017: Edexcel; C4 Maths, Paper 3 Economics. AQA, Edexcel, OCR, Eduqas; GCSE Computer Science
attributes.background: Given the amount of leaks that examination boards such as Edexcel have faced in recent years, student who have done their exams cleanly are at a clear disadvantage. As a student, I would like the government to properly investigate in the operations and procedures that examination boards are using.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "make exam boards transparent and retake them under government control". 

Ofqual is the Office of Qualifications and Examinations Regulations that regulates qualifications, examinations and assessments in England. It is a non-ministerial department and independent.

Ofqual is investigating leaks of examination papers produced by Edexcel. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/allegations-of-wrongdoing-in-edexcels-c4-maths-paper

You can find out mroe about Ofqual here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ofqual
